channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WA

item.title: Report I-2024060001
item.description:
Report I-2024060001

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-14T15:12:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-16
  • City: Tacoma
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Water
  • Carrier/Reporter: TOTE MARITIME ALASKA, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Shipper alerted TOTE that they had 3 road tankers sail on voyage 24077 with undeclared HAZ. At this time the vessel was underway in the Gulf of Alaska. There was a miscommunication with Carlile's maintenance department. They believed the tankers had been cleaned and purged, but there were no certificates provided. Their Heavy Haul division reports that these last contained with methanol, and should have placards. Here are the trailer numbers and bookings: T 8030- SEA001024040 T 8014- SEA001024041 T 53009- SEA001024043

item.title: Report X-2024060420
item.description:
Report X-2024060420

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-12T15:12:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-04
  • City: SEATTLE
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AN AIR PACKAGE WAS STOPPED FOR AN INSPECTION DUE TO THE BOX HAVING A HANDWRITTEN MARKING STATING BATTERY POWERED OPEN WHEN IT ARRIVES. THE OUTER BOX HAS A STICKER APPLIED HANDLE WITH CARE, DELICATE INSTRUMENTS, AND FRAGILE. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED ONE FLUKE 732B DC STANDARD CALIBRATION DEVICE CONTAINING A SEALED LEAD ACID (NON-SPILLABLE) GEL BATTERY INSIDE THE DEVICE. A STICKER ON THE DEVICE INDICATES BATTERY REPLACED 2022-05-04. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. NONSPILLABLE BATTERY IS NOT INDICATED ON THE OUTER BOX.

item.title: Report X-2024051686
item.description:
Report X-2024051686

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-12T15:12:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-24
  • City: SEATTLE
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: X-2024051686: RESPONDER WAS CALLED FOR HAZMAT LEAKER IN THE SORT AILE. USING PROPER PPE RESPONDER CONTAINED THE BOXES AND DEBRIS AND RETURNED TO THE DMN. X-2024051687: RESPONDER WAS CALLED FOR HAZMAT LEAKER IN SORT AILSE. WEARING PROPER PPE RESPONDER CONTAINED THE PACKAGES AND RETURNED TO THE DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
